name: Noobie Cemetery
description:
Enough of these humans trampling your cemetery! The humans have made you, the god of souls, ANGRY! You must invoke ghosts to punish those small humans! But... , yeah... , your ghosts are kinda dumb, can you please hold their hands until the villages they must destroy •ᴗ• ?

Small wowie jam game where you have to help dumb ghosts fight humans. Unfortunately it is not quiet finished, missing sound, menus / transitions and the balance is completely off.

How to Play:
  • Click on the button at the bottom to spawn a ghost, it uses one soul.
  • Drag the ghosts with your mouse to help them find something to fight.
  • Kill all humans and their basement to win !

I hope you'll have fun playing !

Thanks to Kenney for the awesome art ! Most assets comes from the Micro Roguelike pack, I just did some modifications (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike)
